greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(sigma(n), phi(n)) - gcd(sigma(rad(n)), phi(rad(n))); rad = A007947.
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[GCD[DivisorSigma[1, n], EulerPhi@ n] - GCD[DivisorSigma[1, #], EulerPhi@ #] &[Times @@ FactorInteger[n][[All, 1]]], {n, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 19 2017 *)
program: a(n)=my(f=factor(n),k=rad(f)); g(f)-g(k) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Dec 09 2013
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Dec 04 2001
